channel.title: Hey, newbie Question
channel.description:
Hey, i need a good client and server. not the moparscape client btw. lolz i know itz a dumb question, but i really need help. i have not found a good tutorial yet.
i prefer a guide on a 508 client and server and everything there, i tried stormcutters guide but idk what im doing. i dont care whether itz 508 or not i just want a client and server to work and itz all set up so i can start learning java. please help!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

item.title: Hey, newbie Question
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Try looking for Silab’s downloadable client, or Galkon’s Anarchy client; they’re what i use.

I started off with Allstar for my first source, it helped me learn a lot. (has enough stuff in there to get you going) People complain that it’s too big, and that may be true, but it’s still something to start off with.

Read full topic
